skillNeed: Been a while since you last sent out a user survey? Or interviewed a customer? Just want to do a sanity check on a feature? Or sense-check customer behaviours?
skillValue: Through survey design, user interviews, workshops and/or reviewing existing artefacts - I can help you discover user needs, challenges and pain points and translate them to actionable insights
